original_text: “Then the land shall enjoy its Sabbaths as long as it lies desolate, while you are in your enemies' land; then the land shall rest, and enjoy its Sabbaths.
korean_text: 너희가 원수의 땅에 살 동안에 너희의 본토가 황무할 것이므로 땅이 안식을 누릴 것이라 그 때에 땅이 안식을 누리리니

sentences.original_text: Then the land shall enjoy its Sabbaths
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 땅은 그 안식일들을 누릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: as long as it lies desolate
while you are in your enemies' land
